business_intent: To build an input form with various functionalities including text input, buttons for loading data from JIRA, generating test plans, and multiple tabs for navigation. | To provide users with the ability to export test plans in JSON and PDF formats for documentation and audits.

ticket_details.description:
1. URL Field
2. Have an area for raw text
3. Have a “load from JIRA” button
4. Have a button to Generate test plan 
5. Have a button to generate RTM
6. Have multiple tabs for ticket, rtm, requirement,...

1. Enable exporting the generated test plan for documentation or audits.
Acceptance Criteria
1.  “Download JSON” button
2. “Download PDF” button
3. PDF mirrors UI layout
Technical Notes
1. Use backend...
